directions: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onions. Meanwhile, chop the pepper and add it. Next add the cauliflower. Let cook for 10-12 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine the lime zest, lime juice and yogurt and mix until combined.
Once the cauliflower is browned a bit, add the garlic and cook for about 2 more minutes, stirring occasionally so the garlic doesn’t burn.
Spread a dollop of the yogurt on a tortilla, then top with the veggie mixture.
title: CAULIFLOWER TACOS WITH LIME YOGURT
